input.sentences: we had a family get together .
we had great food ready to eat .
the kiddos liked to eat ice cream instead .
output.sentences: My family had a large swing set in the backyard.
My family loved playing on it during cookouts.
When the food was ready, we would all day together.
They would always let the kiddos eat ice pops.
The uncle's really enjoyed talking and catching up.
